name: GPX+ height compactor
description:
For users of Global PokedeX Plus. Made by request for a friend.

A description here is redundant; look at the screenshot to see what it does.
additional_info:
One thing I should mention is that this style makes the banner ads nearly transparent, but doesn't technically remove them, which is just fine with the site's apparent need to pay server fees. 
(The site displays an angry guilt-trippy placeholder image when it detects AdBlock or other such scripts.)
